title: Sell Fortaleza Tequila
metaTitle: Sell Fortaleza Tequila | Winter Blend, Limited Releases | Proof Cellars
metaDescription: Sell your Fortaleza Tequila. We buy Winter Blends, Lote 42-A, Lote 43-A, and older hand-blown bottles. Direct offers.
heroSubhead: We buy Fortaleza Winter Blends and rare lots.
introParagraph: Fortaleza has become the darling of tequila aficionados for its traditional production methods. We purchase limited releases like the annual Winter Blend, as well as highly sought-after batches like Lote 42-A and 43-A. If you have rare or older Fortaleza bottles, we are interested.
whatWeDoNotBuy: Current standard Blanco/Reposado (unless part of collection)
pricingFactors: Winter Blend year (2019 [First Release] is most valuable)

faqs.question: Why is Lote 42-A/43-A valuable?
faqs.answer: These lots were accidentally composed of Extra Añejo tequila but bottled as Añejo, making them unique and delicious.

faqs.question: Do you buy Winter Blend?
faqs.answer: Yes, we buy every vintage of Winter Blend.

faqs.question: Do you buy standard Añejo?
faqs.answer: We buy standard Fortaleza Añejo, though the limited releases command higher prices.

faqs.question: Does the stopper matter?
faqs.answer: Yes, the hand-painted agave piña stopper is part of the brand identity. Broken toppers reduce value.

faqs.question: Do you buy Still Strength?
faqs.answer: Yes, especially older lots of Still Strength Blanco.

faqs.question: How do I ship safely?
faqs.answer: Tape the stopper down securely so it doesn't pop out during transit.
